titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Arthur Few academic records, 1967-2006 UA 191

publicationstmt.publisher: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

note.p: Stored off-site at the Library Service Center. Please request this material via woodson@rice.edu or call 713-348-2586.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-04-02 02:32:59 -0500.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.corpname: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

did.abstract: Academic papers of Dr. Arthur Few, physicist at Rice University, including his journal articles and other publications, his class notes and lectures, and papers regarding Martel College at Rice University.

bioghist.head: Biographical Sketch
bioghist.p: Arthur Few was a Professor of Physics and Environmental Science at Rice University from 1970-2008. He received his PhD from Rice University in 1969. He and his wife, Joan, served as Baker College's Masters from 1994-1999, then as the Masters of Martel College from Martel's founding in 2000 until Dr. Few's retirement in 2008. Dr. Few is one of the leading authorities in weather and astronomical physics. His many research projects included research regarding the acoustical properties of thunder, the global electrical current, and electrical currents at the South Pole.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Dr. Arthur Few's journal articles and other publications, including a VHS on which he collaborated; his class notes and lectures, including overhead projector transparencies, projector slides, and film; and materials regarding Martel College, including a VHS by a Martel student.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: This material is open for research. Restricted items in this collection are marked in the inventory. Please contact the Woodson Research Center for more information. 713-348-2586 or woodson@rice.edu.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Stored off-site at the Library Service Center. Please request this material via woodson@rice.edu or call 713-348-2586.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Collection was donated by Dr. Arthur Few. Delivered by Dr. Few on 4-11-08, 5-9-08, and 6-13-08.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials are organized into three series:

list.item: Series I: Articles and Other Publications, 1967-2004
Series II: Class Notes and Lectures, 1972-2006

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Arthur Few academic papers, 1967-2006, UA 191, Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: See Few, Arthur, Information Files, Woodson Research Center.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Arthur Few Academic Papers must be obtained from the Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Some materials in this series are restricted. Please contact the Woodson Research Center for questions regarding access. 713-348-2586 or woodson@rice.edu.
